dog.name: Tiantian
paragraphs: Is there anything I can help you?
You can click on the phone icon in the bottom right corner of this chat!
more: Welcome back! Did you check out that phone icon in the bottom right corner?.
I don't have much else to say because, well, I'm only programmed with so much

bird.name: Accessory
paragraphs: Although, the hole down there makes me curious!
